Name: Hidden Cubes
About the game: Hidden Cubes is a tactile 3D puzzle game. Twist and turn your viewpoint to figure out how to fit the broken shapes back together again over a series of increasingly complex levels. Play over 60 levels (with more on the way!) ranging from easy, to challenging, to nearly impossible at times. Discover tricks and shortcuts to improve your level times. Featuring music by Glass Boy, Graham Boyle, and Little Glass men. About NixieCraft This is our first full-size game, and we really hope you enjoy playing it. Keep an eye out for more from us HERE!
